ComicInfo.Title: Sir!
ComicInfo.Summary: Sir!: Thor, Frog of Thunder, returns to Asgard to confront Loki and get him to break the amphibian curse. The curse is actually lifted by Volstagg, who finds Surtur's sword and breaks Loki's hold over its power. Hela releases Kurse from Hel. Thor abdicates the throne, and proposes Balder for king of Asgard.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 14:15:49. [Issue ID 41331]
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority

ComicInfo.Inker: Walt Simonson,Al Milgrom,Bob Wiacek,Walt Simonson,Al Milgrom,Bob Wiacek
